tool_description: Manages fallback notification strategies when primary delivery methods fail, automatically triggering alternative channels and retry mechanisms.

order_id.description: Order ID for the failed notifications

customer_id.description: Customer ID for fallback channel lookup

failed_channels.description: List of notification channels that failed

retry_primary.description: Whether to retry primary channels before using fallbacks

max_retries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts per channel

error_messages: Invalid order_id: Order ID must be a non-empty string
Invalid customer_id: Customer ID must be a non-empty string
Empty failed channels: At least one failed channel must be specified
Invalid channel name: Channel names must be one of [email, sms, push, webhook]
Invalid max_retries: Maximum retries must be between 1 and 10
No fallback options: No alternative notification channels available for customer
All channels exhausted: All primary and fallback channels have failed
usage: Provide order_id, customer_id, and list of failed_channels. Optionally configure retry_primary and max_retries. The tool attempts alternative delivery methods based on customer preferences.

fallback_plan.description: Ordered list of fallback channels to attempt

successful_channel.description: Channel that successfully delivered the notification

execution_log.description: Log of all fallback attempts and their outcomes
